colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS DE SKAD CES BKA' STZAL NAS, ,DGE SLONG GI DGE 'DUN CHEN PO RNAMS DANG DPAL RDO RJE SDER MO DANG, RIG PA 'DZIN PA'I DGE 'DUN CHEN PO DANG, LHA DANG MI DANG GNOD SBYIN DANG, SRIN PO DANG, DRI ZA DANG, LHA MA YIN DANG, NAM MKHA' @011B LDING DANG, MI'AM CI DANG, LTO 'PHYE CHEN PO DANG, MI DANG MI MA YIN PA DE DAG DANG, THAMS CAD DANG LDAN PA'I 'KHOR DE DAG YI RANG STE, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS GSUNGS PA LA MNGON PAR BSTOD DO, ,DPAL RDO RJE SDER MO ZHES BYA BA'I GZUNGS RDZOGS S+HO, ,)
